import React, { Component } from 'react' // import BookDetails from './BookDetails' import {Label, Rating, Image, Card, Modal } from 'semantic-ui-react' export class BookCard extends Component { handleClick = () => { console.log('you are in click') } render() { return (
this.handleClick()}> {this.props.book.volumeInfo.title} {this.props.book.volumeInfo.authors}
) } } export default BookCard
